title: A Prayer for Mission
content: O God, you manifest in your servants the signs of your presence: Send forth upon us the Spirit of love...
spanish_title: Colectas por la Misión de la Iglesia
spanish_content: Oh Dios, manifiestas en tus siervos las señales de tu presencia: Envía sobre nosotros el Espíritu de amor, para que, en compañía de unos con otros, tu abundante gracia aumente entre nosotros; por Jesucristo nuestro Señor. Amén.

title: For the Ordination of Deacons
content: Almighty God, by your divine providence you appointed various Orders of Ministers in your Church...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, por tu divina providencia designaste varias Órdenes de Ministros en tu Iglesia, e inspiraste a tus Apóstoles a nombrar a la Orden de los Diáconos al primer mártir Esteban, junto con otros: misericordiosamente, contempla a estos tus siervos ahora llamados al mismo Oficio y administración...

title: For Those Still in Our Pilgrimage
content: Grant to us who are still in our pilgrimage, and who walk as yet by faith, that your Holy Spirit may lead us...
spanish_content: Concédenos a los que todavía estamos en nuestro peregrinaje y a los que todavía caminamos por la fe, que tu Espíritu Santo nos guíe en santidad y justicia todos nuestros días.

title: For the Blessing of a Grave
content: O God, whose blessed Son was laid in a tomb in the garden: Bless, we pray, this grave...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, cuyo Hijo bendito fue puesto en un sepulcro en el huerto: Bendice, te rogamos, este sepulcro, apartado para el reposo de tu siervo N....

title: At a Burial
content: In sure and certain hope of the resurrection to eternal life through our Lord Jesus Christ, we commend...
spanish_content: Con esperanza cierta y segura de la resurrección a la vida eterna por medio de nuestro Señor Jesucristo, encomendamos al Dios Todopoderoso a nuestro hermano N....

title: Solemn Collect against Evil, Sickness, and Pestilence
content: Let us pray to God the Father Almighty, that he would cleanse the world from all evil; deliver it from pestilence...
spanish_content: Oremos a Dios Padre Todopoderoso, que limpie el mundo de todo mal; líbralo de la pestilencia y del hambre; libera a los que están en cautiverio...

title: Collect of a New Rector
content: O Lord my God, I am not worthy to have you come under my roof; yet you have called your servant to stand...
spanish_content: Señor Dios mío, no soy digno de que entres bajo mi techo; sin embargo, has llamado a tu siervo para que esté en tu casa y sirva en tu altar. A Ti y a tu servicio me dedico en cuerpo, alma y espíritu...

title: Confession of Sin (Daily Office)
content: Almighty and most merciful Father, we have erred and strayed from your ways like lost sheep...
spanish_content: Padre todopoderoso y misericordioso, nos hemos equivocado y desviado de tus caminos como ovejas extraviadas. Hemos seguido demasiado los engaños y deseos de nuestro propio corazón...

title: Israel's Deliverance at the Red Sea
content: O God, whose wonderful deeds of old shine forth even to our own day, by the power of your mighty arm you once delivered...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, cuyas maravillas de antaño resplandecen hasta nuestros días, por el poder de tu brazo poderoso libraste una vez a tu pueblo escogido de la esclavitud...

title: A Prayer for the Dead
content: May his soul and the souls of all the faithful departed, through the mercy of God, rest in peace. Amen.
spanish_content: Que su alma, y las almas de todos los fieles difuntos, por la misericordia de Dios, descansen en paz. Amén.

title: For the Gift of Children in Marriage
content: Bestow upon them, if it be your will, the gift and heritage of children, and the grace to bring them up...
spanish_content: Otórgales, si es tu voluntad, el don y la herencia de los hijos, y la gracia de educarlos para que te conozcan, te amen y te sirvan.

title: Compline Antiphon
content: Guide us waking, O Lord, and guard us sleeping; that awake we may watch with Christ...
spanish_content: Guíanos despiertos, oh Señor, y guárdanos durmiendo; para que despiertos velemos con Cristo, y dormidos descansemos en paz.

title: Concluding Prayer at the Institution of a Rector
content: Almighty God, you have built your Church upon the foundation of the Apostles and Prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief cornerstone...
spanish_content: Dios todopoderoso, que has edificado tu Iglesia sobre el fundamento de los Apóstoles y Profetas, siendo la principal piedra del ángulo el mismo Jesucristo...

title: A Collect for Strength to Await Christ's Return
content: O God our King, by the resurrection of your Son Jesus Christ on the first day of the week, you conquered sin...
spanish_content: Oh Dios Rey nuestro, por la resurrección de tu Hijo Jesucristo el primer día de la semana, tú venciste el pecado, hiciste huir la muerte y nos diste la esperanza de la vida eterna...

title: A Prayer for Mission
content: O God, you have made of one blood all the peoples of the earth, and sent your blessed Son to preach peace...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, que has hecho de una sola sangre a todos los pueblos de la tierra, y enviaste a tu bendito Hijo a predicar la paz...

title: A Prayer for Mission
content: Lord Jesus Christ, you stretched out your arms of love on the hard wood of the Cross that everyone might come...
spanish_content: Señor Jesucristo, tú extendiste tus brazos amorosos sobre el cruel madero de la cruz, para estrechar a todos los seres humanos en tu abrazo salvador...

title: A Prayer for Mission
content: Keep watch, dear Lord, with those who work, or watch, or weep this night...
spanish_content: Vela, querido Señor, con los que trabajan, o velan o lloran esta noche, y da a tus ángeles a cargo de los que duermen...

title: At a Burial of a Veteran of the Armed Forces.
content: O Ruler of the universe, Lord God, by the strength of your own arm you have won for us final victory...
spanish_content: Oh Señor del universo, Señor Dios, con la fuerza de tu propio brazo nos has ganado la victoria final sobre el poder del pecado y la muerte...

title: Prayer for the Great Plague of 1665
content: O Most gracious God, Father of mercies and of our Lord Jesus Christ, look down upon us...
spanish_content: [Text Not in Provided Spanish PDF]

title: Confession of Sin (Holy Eucharist: Standard Anglican)
content: Almighty God, Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, maker and judge of us all: We acknowledge and lament our many sins...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, Padre de nuestro Señor Jesucristo, Creador y juez de todos nosotros: Confesamos y lamentamos nuestros muchos pecados y ofensas...

title: At a Burial
content: O God, whose days are without end, and whose mercies cannot be numbered: Make us, we pray, deeply aware of the shortness...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, cuyos días son sin fin, y cuyas misericordias no pueden contarse: Haznos, te rogamos, profundamente conscientes de la brevedad e incertidumbre de la vida humana...

title: For the Dead
content: Grant us grace to entrust N. to your never-failing love; receive him into the arms of your mercy...
spanish_content: Concédenos la gracia de confiar a N. a tu amor inagotable; recíbelo en los brazos de tu misericordia y acuérdate de él conforme al favor que muestras a todo tu pueblo.

title: A Prayer for Mission
content: Almighty and everlasting God, who alone works great marvels: Send down upon our clergy...
spanish_content: Dios poderoso y eterno, el único que obra grandes maravillas: Envía sobre nuestro clero y las congregaciones encomendadas a su cargo...

title: Solemn Collect for Ourselves
content: Let us pray for all those who do not believe in Christ... Merciful God, creator of all the peoples of the earth...
spanish_content: Dios misericordioso, creador de todos los pueblos de la tierra y amante de las almas: Ten compasión de todos los que no te conocen...

title: For Those Who Mourn, at the Burial
content: Most merciful God, whose wisdom is beyond our understanding: deal graciously with those who mourn...
spanish_content: Dios misericordioso, cuya sabiduría está más allá de nuestro entendimiento: trata con gracia a los que lloran [especialmente a _____].

title: Concluding Collect for the Prayers of the People...
content: we may behold the order and beauty of things heavenly; through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.
spanish_title: Consagración de un Lugar de Culto
spanish_content: ...podamos admirar el orden y la belleza de las cosas celestiales; por Jesucristo Nuestro Señor. Amén.

title: In Time of Great Sickness and Mortality
content: O Most mighty and merciful God, in this time of grievous sickness, we flee to you for comfort.
spanish_content: [Text Not in Provided Spanish PDF]

title: The Gathering of God's People
content: Almighty God, you called your Church to bear witness that you were in Christ reconciling the world to yourself...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, llamaste a tu Iglesia a dar testimonio de que estabas en Cristo reconciliando el mundo hacia ti...

title: Prayer for a Vigil
content: O God, who by the glorious resurrection of your Son Jesus Christ destroyed death and brought life and immortality...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, que por la gloriosa resurrección de tu Hijo Jesucristo destruyó la muerte y sacó a la luz la vida y la inmortalidad...

title: Blessing of the Font or Basin
content: Almighty and everlasting Father, in your great mercy you saved Noah and his family in the Ark...
spanish_content: Padre todopoderoso y eterno, en tu gran misericordia salvaste a Noé y a su familia en el Arca de la destrucción del diluvio...

title: At the Litany of Penitence
content: Show favor to your people, O Lord, who turn to you in weeping, fasting, and prayer.
spanish_content: Muestra favor a tu pueblo, oh Señor, que se vuelve a ti con llanto, ayuno y oración.

title: God's Presence in a Renewed Israel
content: O God, you led your ancient people by a pillar of cloud by day and a pillar of fire by night...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, que guiaste a tu antiguo pueblo con una columna de nubes de día y una columna de fuego de noche...

title: Prayer for the Whole State... for the Departed
content: We remember before you all your servants who have departed this life in your faith and fear...
spanish_content: Recordamos ante de Ti a todos tus siervos que han partido de esta vida en tu fe y temor, [especialmente _____,] para que se cumpla tu voluntad en ellos...

title: The Ordination of Priests
content: Almighty God and most merciful Father, of your infinite love and goodness you have given your only Son Jesus Christ...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso y Padre lleno de misericordia, por tu infinito amor y bondad has dado a tu único Hijo Jesucristo para que sea nuestro redentor...

title: Concluding Collect for the Dead
content: Almighty God, grant us, with all who have died in the hope of the resurrection, the fullness of life...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, concédenos, con todos los que han muerto en la esperanza de la resurrección, la plenitud de vida en tu gloria eterna...

title: Before the Commendation
content: Give rest, O Christ, to your servant with your saints, Where sorrow and pain are no more...
spanish_content: Da descanso, oh Cristo, a tu siervo con tus santos, Donde ya no hay dolor ni pena, ni gemidos, sino vida eterna.

title: Solemn Collect against Hersey and Schism
content: Let us pray for all who are in heresy or schism... O God of truth and love, who desires not the death of sinners...
spanish_content: Oremos por todos los que están en herejía o cisma... Oh Dios de verdad y de amor, que no deseas la muerte de los pecadores...

title: Blessing of Water in the Font or Basin
content: Now, Father, sanctify this water by the power of your Holy Spirit. May all who are baptized here...
spanish_content: Ahora, Padre, santifica esta agua por el poder de tu Espíritu Santo. Que todos los que aquí se bauticen sean limpiados del pecado...

title: Prayer after Absolution
content: O most loving Father, by your mercy you put away the sins of those who truly repent...
spanish_content: Oh muy amoroso Padre, por tu misericordia quitas los pecados de los que verdaderamente se arrepienten y no recuerdas más sus pecados.

title: At a Burial
content: O God, the King of saints, we praise and glorify your holy Name for all your servants who have finished their course...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, Rey de los santos, alabamos y glorificamos tu santo Nombre por todos tus siervos que han terminado su carrera en tu fe y temor...

title: Solemn Collect for Our Bishops
content: Let us pray for N. our Bishop... Almighty and everlasting God, whose judgment upholds all things...
spanish_content: Oremos por N. nuestro Obispo... Dios todopoderoso y eterno, cuyo juicio sustenta todas las cosas, tanto en el cielo como en la tierra...

title: Confession of Sin (Holy Eucharist: Ancient Renewed)
content: Most merciful God, we confess that we have sinned against you in thought, word, and deed...
spanish_content: Dios de gran misericordia, confesamos que hemos pecado contra ti en pensamiento, palabra y obra...

title: For the Institution of a Rector
content: Most gracious Father, the Giver of all good and perfect gifts, in your wise providence you appoint leaders...
spanish_content: Padre misericordioso, Dador de todos los dones buenos y perfectos, en tu sabia providencia nombras líderes para la misión de tu Iglesia...

title: At a Burial
content: Merciful God, Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who is the resurrection and the life: Raise us...
spanish_content: Misericordioso Dios, Padre de nuestro Señor Jesucristo, que es la resurrección y la vida: Levántanos...

title: For Those Who Mourn
content: Almighty God, look with pity upon the sorrows of your servants for whom we pray...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, mira con compasión los dolores de tus siervos por quienes oramos. Acuérdate de ellos, Señor, en misericordia...

title: At a Burial
content: Grant, O Lord, to all who are bereaved the spirit of faith and courage, that they may have strength...
spanish_content: Concede, oh Señor, a todos los afligidos el espíritu de fe y fortaleza, para que tengan la fuerza para afrontar los días venideros...

title: Prayer for the Whole State... for the Clergy
content: Give grace, heavenly Father, to all Bishops, Priests, and Deacons, and especially to your servant(s) N...
spanish_content: Dales gracia Padre celestial, a todos los Obispos, Sacerdotes y Diáconos, y especialmente a tus siervos N....

title: A Prayer for Mission
content: O God and Father of all, whom the whole heavens adore: Let the whole earth also worship you...
spanish_content: Oh Dios y Padre de todos, a quien todos los cielos adoran: que toda la tierra te adore, todas las naciones te obedezcan...

title: Concluding Collect at Ordinations
content: Go before us, O Lord, in all our doings with your most gracious favor, and further us with your continual help...
spanish_content: Ve delante de nosotros, oh Señor, en todo lo que hacemos con tu más misericordioso favor, y ayúdanos continuamente...

title: Confession of Sin (Reconciliation of a Penitent)
content: I confess to Almighty God, to his Church, and to you, that I have sinned by my own fault...
spanish_content: Yo confieso ante Dios Todopoderoso, a su Iglesia y a usted, que he pecado por mi propia culpa...

title: Opening Collect for the Consecration of a Place of Worship
content: O Eternal God, mighty in power, of majesty incomprehensible, whom the heavens cannot contain...
spanish_title: Consagración de un Lugar de Culto
spanish_content: Oh Eterno Dios, grandioso en poder, de majestad incomprensible, a quien los cielos no pueden contener...

title: The Post Communion Prayer (Anglican Standard)
content: Almighty and everliving God, we thank you for feeding us, in these holy mysteries...
spanish_content: Omnipotente y Eterno Dios, Te damos gracias porque nos has nutrido en estos santos misterios...

title: Blessing and Consecration of the Holy Table
content: Father, on the night that he was betrayed, your Son Jesus Christ instituted for us the banquet of our salvation...
spanish_content: Padre, en la noche en que fue entregado, tu Hijo Jesucristo instituyó para nosotros el banquete de nuestra salvación...

title: Solemn Collect for Unbelievers
content: Let us pray for all those who do not believe in Christ... Merciful God, creator of all the peoples...
spanish_content: Oremos por todos aquellos que no creen en Cristo... Dios misericordioso, creador de todos los pueblos de la tierra y amante de las almas...

title: For Blessing on a Marriage
content: Most gracious God, we give you thanks for your tender love in sending Jesus Christ to come among us...
spanish_content: Dios misericordioso, te damos gracias por tu tierno amor al enviar a Jesucristo para que venga entre nosotros...

title: Solemn Collect for Our Leaders
content: Let us pray for N. our President... Almighty God, whose kingdom is everlasting and whose power is infinite...
spanish_content: Oremos por N. nuestro Presidente... Dios Todopoderoso, cuyo reino es eterno y cuyo poder es infinito...

title: Thanksgiving over Water
content: We thank you, Almighty God, for the gift of water. Over it the Holy Spirit moved in the beginning...
spanish_content: Te damos gracias, Padre todopoderoso, por el don del agua. Sobre ella, el Espíritu Santo se movía en el principio...

title: Prayer for Baptismal Candidates
content: Almighty and everlasting Father, in your great mercy you saved Noah and his family in the Ark...
spanish_content: Padre Todopoderoso y Eterno, en tu gran misericordia salvaste de la destrucción del diluvio a Noé y a su familia en el arca...

title: For Those Who Mourn
content: Grant to all who mourn a sure confidence in your fatherly care, that, casting their grief on you...
spanish_content: Concede a todos los que lloran una confianza segura en tu cuidado paternal, para que, echando toda su ansiedad sobre Ti...

title: The Post Communion Prayer (Renewed Ancient)
content: Heavenly Father, We thank you for feeding us with the spiritual food of the most precious Body and Blood...
spanish_content: Padre Celestial, te damos gracias porque nos has nutrido con el alimento espiritual del preciosísimo Cuerpo y Sangre...

title: At Compline
content: O God, your unfailing providence sustains the world we live in and the life we live...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, tu infalible providencia sostiene al mundo en que vivimos y la vida que vivimos...

title: For Wisdom and Devotion in Marriage
content: Grant them wisdom and devotion in the ordering of their common life...
spanish_content: Concédeles sabiduría y devoción en la organización de su vida común...

title: At a Burial
content: Forasmuch as it has pleased Almighty God of his great mercy to take unto himself...
spanish_content: Puesto que se le ha complacido a Dios Todopoderoso en su gran misericordia tomar para sí el alma...

title: Prayer for a Vigil
content: Most merciful God, whose wisdom is beyond our understanding: deal graciously...
spanish_content: Dios misericordioso, cuya sabiduría está más allá de nuestro entendimiento: trata con gracia...

title: For Witness in Marriage
content: May their union in Holy Matrimony be a sign of the love between Christ...
spanish_content: Que su unión en el Santo Matrimonio sea signo del amor entre Cristo y su Iglesia...

title: Thanksgiving for a Baptism
content: Heavenly Father, we thank you that by water and the Holy Spirit you have bestowed...
spanish_content: Padre celestial, te damos gracias porque por medio del agua y del Espíritu Santo has concedido a estos tus siervos...

title: During the Palm Procession
content: Almighty God, whose most dear Son went not up to joy but first he suffered pain...
spanish_content: Dios todopoderoso, cuyo Hijo amadísimo no subió al gozo, sino que primero sufrió el dolor...

title: At the Palm Procession
content: We praise you, Almighty God, for the acts of love by which you have redeemed us...
spanish_content: Nosotros te alabamos, Dios Todopoderoso, por las obras de amor con que nos has redimido...

title: At a Burial
content: Almighty God, Father of mercies and giver of comfort: Deal graciously, we pray...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, mira con compasión los dolores de tus siervos por quienes oramos. (Note: Adapted in Spanish text, matches 'Deal graciously')

title: For the Dead
content: Grant that, increasing in knowledge and love of you, he may go from strength to strength...
spanish_content: Concédele que, aumentando en conocimiento y amor por ti, pueda ir de fortaleza en fortaleza...

title: Requiem Aeternam
content: Rest eternal grant to him, O Lord; and may his soul...
spanish_content: Que le concedas el descanso eterno, oh Señor; y que su alma...

title: Solemn Collect for the Jews
content: Let us pray for the Jewish people: that the Lord our God may look graciously upon them...
spanish_content: Oremos por el pueblo judío: para que el Señor nuestro Dios los mire con misericordia...

title: For the Renewal of Baptismal Vows
content: Almighty God, you have built your Church upon the foundation of the Apostles and Prophets...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, que has edificado a tu Iglesia sobre el fundamento de los Apóstoles y Profetas...

title: At a Burial
content: Father of all, we pray to you for those we love, but see no longer...
spanish_content: Padre de todos, te rogamos por los que amamos, pero ya no vemos...

title: Prayer for the Whole State of Christ's Church: for the Universal Church
content: Almighty and everliving God, we are taught by your holy Word to offer prayers...
spanish_content: Dios todopoderoso y eterno, tu santa Palabra nos enseña a ofrecer oraciones y súplicas...

title: Prayer for the Whole State of Christ's Church: for Those in Trouble...
content: We ask you in your goodness, O Lord, to comfort and sustain all who in this transitory life...
spanish_content: Te pedimos en tu bondad, oh Señor, que consueles y sostengas a todos los que en esta vida transitoria...

title: A Concluding Prayer for Good Friday
content: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of the living God, we pray you to set your passion...
spanish_content: Señor Jesucristo, Hijo del Dios vivo, te rogamos que pongas tu pasión, cruz y muerte entre tu juicio y nuestras almas...

title: At Compline
content: Be present, O merciful God, and protect us through the hours of this night...
spanish_content: Está presente, oh Dios misericordioso, y protégenos durante las horas de esta noche...

title: For the Whole Church
content: Let us pray for the holy Church throughout the world... Almighty Father, we pray for your holy catholic Church.
spanish_content: Oremos por la santa Iglesia en todo el mundo... Padre Todopoderoso, oramos por tu santa Iglesia católica.

title: At the Reception of the Body
content: O Sovereign Lord Christ, deliver your servant, N., from all evil...
spanish_content: Oh Señor Soberano Cristo, libera a tu siervo N. de todo mal y líbralo de toda atadura...

title: At the Palm Procession
content: Assist us mercifully with your help, O Lord God of our salvation...
spanish_content: Asístenos misericordiosamente con tu ayuda, oh Señor Dios de nuestra salvación...

title: Post Communion Prayer at the Institution of a Rector
content: Almighty Father, we thank you for feeding us with the holy food...
spanish_content: Padre todopoderoso, te damos gracias por alimentarnos con el santo alimento del Cuerpo...

title: For a Sick Person When There Is Little Hope of Recovery
content: O Father of mercies and God of all comfort, our only help in time of need...
spanish_content: Oh Padre de misericordias y Dios de todo consuelo, nuestra única ayuda en tiempos de necesidad...

title: At Compline
content: Look down, O Lord, from your heavenly throne, illumine this night...
spanish_content: Mira hacia abajo, oh Señor, desde tu trono celestial, ilumina esta noche...

title: At a Cremation
content: In sure and certain hope of the resurrection... we commit his body to be consumed by fire...
spanish_content: Con esperanza cierta y segura de la resurrección... entregamos su cuerpo para ser consumido por el fuego...

title: For the Newly Married and All Married Couples
content: Give them such grace that together they may reach out in love and concern...
spanish_content: Dales tanta gracia que juntos puedan tender la mano con amor y beneficio por los demás...

title: After a Burial
content: Almighty God, with whom do live the spirits of those who depart in the Lord...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, con quien viven los espíritus de los que han muerto en el Señor...

title: For Growth in Love and Devotion in Marriage
content: Grant that their wills may be so knit together in your will...
spanish_content: Haz que sus voluntades estén tan entrelazadas en tu voluntad...

title: Blessing of the Ashes
content: Almighty God, you have created us from the dust of the earth...
spanish_content: Dios todopoderoso, nos has creado del polvo de la tierra: Haz que estas cenizas sean para nosotros un símbolo...

title: Prayer for the Whole State of Christ's Church: for Our Leaders
content: We pray that you will lead the nations of the world in the way of righteousness...
spanish_content: Te imploramos que conduzcas a las naciones del mundo por el camino de la justicia...

title: Post-Communion Prayer at a Burial
content: Almighty God, we thank you that in your great love you have fed us...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, te damos gracias porque en tu gran amor nos has alimentado...

title: Solemn Collect for the Holy Church
content: [Fragment: f Amen]
spanish_content: Padre Todopoderoso, oramos por tu santa Iglesia católica. Llénala con toda verdad...

title: For Courage and Reconciliation in Marriage
content: Give them courage, when they hurt each other, to recognize and acknowledge...
spanish_content: Dales valor, cuando se lastimen el uno al otro, para reconocer y examinar sus faltas...

title: For Those Made One Flesh in Marriage
content: Eternal God, creator and preserver of all life, author of salvation...
spanish_content: Dios eterno, creador y preservador de toda vida, autor de salvación y dador de toda gracia...

title: At a Burial
content: Lord Jesus Christ, by your death you took away the sting of death...
spanish_content: Señor Jesucristo, que con tu muerte quitaste el aguijón de la muerte...

title: For Belief and Trust
content: Help us, we pray, in the midst of things we cannot understand...
spanish_content: Te pedimos que nos ayudes en medio de cosas que no podemos entender, a creer y confiar...

title: For the Ordination of Priests
content: Almighty God, giver of all good things, by your Holy Spirit you have appointed...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, dador de todos los bienes, por tu Espíritu Santo has designado...

title: At the Conclusion of the Ash Wednesday Liturgy
content: O Lord our God, grant us grace to desire you with our whole heart...
spanish_content: Señor Dios nuestro, concédenos la gracia de desearte con todo nuestro corazón...

title: For a Home of Blessing and Peace in Marriage
content: Grant that they may so love, honor, and cherish each other in faithfulness...
spanish_content: Concédeles que se amen, se honren y uno al otro se respete con fidelidad...

title: For the Ordination and Consecration of Bishops
content: Almighty God, who by your Son Jesus Christ gave many excellent gifts...
spanish_content: Dios todopoderoso, que por tu Hijo Jesucristo diste muchos dones excelentes...

title: Solemn Collect for the Clergy
content: Let us pray for all Bishops... Almighty and everlasting God, by whose Spirit...
spanish_content: Oremos por todos los Obispos... Dios todopoderoso y eterno, por cuyo Espíritu...

title: Prayer at the Laying on of Hands
content: Almighty and everliving God, we beseech you to strengthen these your servants...
spanish_content: Dios todopoderoso y eterno, te suplicamos que fortalezcas a estos tus siervos...

title: Blessing of the Pulpit
content: Father, in every age you have spoken through the voices of prophets...
spanish_content: Padre, en cada época has hablado por medio de las voces de los profetas...

title: Blessing of the Lectern
content: Father, your eternal Word speaks to us through the words of Holy Scripture.
spanish_content: Padre, tu Palabra eterna nos habla a través de las palabras de la Sagrada Escritura.

title: Concluding Collect for the Consecration of a Place of Worship
content: Blessed be your Name, O Lord God, for it pleases you to have your habitation...
spanish_content: Bendito sea tu Nombre, oh Señor Dios, porque te agrada tener tu habitación entre tu pueblo...

title: At Compline
content: Visit this place, O Lord, and drive far from it all snares of the enemy...
spanish_content: Visita este lugar, oh Señor, y aleja de él todos los engaños del enemigo...

title: Blessing of Instruments and Bells
content: Father, your people worship you with many voices and sounds...
spanish_content: Padre, tu gente te adora con muchas voces y sonidos...

title: Confession of Sin (Compline)
content: Almighty God and Father, we confess to you, to one another...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso y Padre, te confesamos, unos a otros...

title: Post-Communion Prayer at a Marriage
content: O God, the giver of all that is true and lovely and gracious...
spanish_content: Oh Dios, dador de todo lo que es verdadero, agradable y misericordioso...

title: Prayer for the Whole State of Christ's Church: Conclusion
content: Heavenly Father, grant these our prayers for the sake of Jesus Christ...
spanish_content: Padre Celestial, concédenos estas oraciones nuestras por amor a Jesucristo...

title: For the Baptized
content: Grant that all who have been baptized into Christ's death and resurrection...
spanish_content: Concede que todos los que han sido bautizados en la muerte y resurrección de Cristo...

title: For the Whole Communion of Saints
content: Almighty God, you knit together your elect in one communion and fellowship...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, Tú unes a tus elegidos en una comunión y fraternidad...

title: Prayer for the Whole State of Christ's Church: for Those Who Proclaim the Gospel
content: Prosper, we pray, all those who proclaim the Gospel of your kingdom...
spanish_content: Te pedimos que hagas prosperar a todos los que proclaman el Evangelio de tu reino...

title: Thanksgiving for a Safe Childbirth
content: Almighty God, we give you humble thanks for graciously preserving...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, te damos humildes gracias por haber preservado bondadosamente...

title: Abraham's Sacrifice of Issac
content: Almighty God, whose servant Abraham faithfully obeyed your call...
spanish_content: Dios Todopoderoso, cuyo siervo Abraham obedeció fielmente tu llamado...

title: Solemn Collect for Those Preparing for Holy Baptism
content: Let us pray for those who are preparing for Holy Baptism...
spanish_content: Oremos por los que se preparan para el Santo Bautismo...

title: For Pardon and Peace
content: Grant to your faithful people pardon and peace, that we may be cleansed...
spanish_content: Concede a tu pueblo fiel perdón y paz, para que seamos limpios de todos nuestros pecados...

title: Collect of the Day for the Consecration of a Place of Worship
content: O God of unchangeable power and eternal light: Look favorably on your whole Church...
spanish_content: Oh Dios de poder inmutable y luz eterna: Mira favorablemente a toda tu Iglesia...

title: The Collect of the Day for Marriage
content: O gracious and everliving God, you have created us male and female...
spanish_content: Oh Dios misericordioso y eterno, tú que nos has creado varón y hembra...
